resource.chars:
1893) Swinhoe by Salvin (31 43
10, Chandos Street 
Cavendish Square 
W.
2 June 1893
Dear Sirs,
I have examined Col Swinhoe’s
Paper with great care, and being 
familiar with the insects he treats 
of I venture to offer the following 
remarks.
In selecting <u>Hypolimnas<\u> in general 
and <u>H. bolina <\u> in particular as 
subjects for investigation Col. Swinhoe 
has chosen a genus and a species 
greatly in need of thorough systematic 
revision. This is especially the case
